import React from 'react' import LunaImg from '../../images/Luna.png' import LioImg from '../../images/Lio.png' import BellaImg from '../../images/Bella.png' const reviewData = [ { id: 1, name: 'Luna', location: 'New Delhi, India', imgSrc: LunaImg, review: `“The only best decision my hooman every made was, getting in touch with cat.fit.”` }, { id: 2, name: 'Lio', location: 'Kolkata, India', imgSrc: LioImg, review: `“My hooman is really dumb, but he made the right choice by getting help from cat.fit.”` }, { id: 2, name: 'Bella', location: 'Bangalore, India', imgSrc: BellaImg, review: `“Thank you to the vets from cat.fit, I’m healthy again. Now, I can get back to annoying my hooman!”` } ] const Card = ({ data: { name, location, imgSrc, review } }) => (

{review}

{name}

{location}

) const Testimonials = () => { return (

Testimonials

Meet our Feline Clients
{reviewData.map((data) => ( ))}
) } export default Testimonials
